articles.title: Furloughed hairdresser, 20, on brink of becoming millionaire selling gym equipment - Mirror Online
articles.description: When Ben Gulliver was furloughed he followed his lifelong dream of becoming an entrepreneur, selling gym equipment and teeth whitening sets out of his parent's garage
articles.content:
A furloughed hairdresser is set to become a millionaire after starting a £12,000-a-day DIY business.
